short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't let bad reviews rain on your parade. This extension hides all 1, 2, and 3 star reviews, and the average rating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't let bad reviews rain on your parade. This extension hides all 1, 2, and 3 star reviews, and the average rating. This lets authors focus on what readers love, and what they love to do: write. Designed by the spouse of an author, for the peace of mind of writers everywhere.
